title: Illaoi voice heard across map
body: I was playing a game which throughout Illaois voice could be heard from everywhere

replies.body:
Hey RyuuKyuubi,

I suggest posting this over in the [NA Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) forum. I've seen the report before and am sure Riot is aware, but another report won't hurt. This board is for getting help with technical issues.

Thanks.
-DTN
